results.title: Effect of Simvastatin-Ezetimibe Compared With Simvastatin Monotherapy After Acute Coronary Syndrome Among Patients 75 Years or Older: A Secondary Analysis of a Randomized Clinical Trial.
results.text_hl: The rate of adverse events did not increase with @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin-ezetimibe@@@ vs @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-placebo among younger or older @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.
